text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's been several days since the<n>tryouts took place, but I
can't get<n>Tamamo Cross's words out of my<n>head.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
You're a rookie trainer, aren't ya?<n>What makes ya think a
no-name<n>trainer like you has what it takes?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Ya really think ya can take me on,<n>train me up, and turn me
into a<n>champ?! I'm not just talkin' G1<n>here—I mean all of
Japan!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's clear she wants to win, and<n>she's ready to make it
happen. At the<n>time, I wasn't ready to face her<n>
determination head-on.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Full of conviction, I search high and<n>low for Tamamo Cross.
After ruling<n>out the academy buildings, I head to<n>the
training course.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Huff, puff! Huff, puff!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
There, I find Tamamo Cross, running<n>as if her life depends
on it.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Huff... Haaaa!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Huff... Huff... Crud... Not gettin'any better, am I?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: You again!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: I'm really sorry!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
You went to the trouble of checkin'<n>up on me, and I just
threw it back in<n>your face... Seriously, I'm sorry.
choice_data_list: It's okay. I know you were upset.
It's okay. I know you were upset.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Yeah... I was just frustrated, ya<n>know? I ran like crap out
there, and<n>now all the trainers think I'm some<n>third-rate
chump racer.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
People tend to take one look at me<n>and assume I'm a
weaklin' 'cause<n>of my size.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Sayin' stuff like, "You'll get hurt."<n>"Best in Japan? Not
happenin',<n>pipsqueak." "That dream's a bit too<n>big for
you."

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
I wanted to show 'em all what I'm<n>made of. Show 'em I'm
a winner too.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
But, well... you saw what happened. I<n>screwed it all up with
that lousy<n>runnin' of mine.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
The whole reason I'm at this<n>school's 'cause I've got a
dream.<n>And I needa be in the Twinkle Series<n>to make it
happen.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Just runnin' isn't gonna get me<n>nowhere. I gotta win, and
win a lot at<n>that! I needa run faster than<n>wind—faster than
light!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, sorry 'bout the other day. I<n>should get back to
practice. I wanna<n>win the next tryouts, ya see. So I<n>gotta—

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Where'd that come from? If<n>you're tryin' to make
me feel better,<n>don't. I'm fine.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
C-c'mon, you saw my last race,<n>didn't ya?! My form's
pathetic... I<n>couldn't even hit the board!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Sure, I may talk a big game, but... I<n>can't back it up. And I
don't know<n>how to get better.
choice_data_list: But you want to win. More than anyone.
But you want to win. More than anyone.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
No one feels the bitterness of defeat<n>stronger than Tamamo
Cross. Her<n>desire to leave it behind and race<n>forward to
win... matters far more than<n>her size.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
That attitude is what will make her the<n>top racer in all of
Japan.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
I don't get your confidence. You've<n>only seen me race
once, and then we<n>chatted for what, ten minutes tops?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: You've got a screw loose, ya know<n>that?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Anyway... Mind if we talk somewhere<n>else? I'm all cooled
down, and there<n>are a few too many eyes on us here,<n>
yeah? C'mon.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As she invites me to talk, her<n>demeanor seems warmer
somehow. I<n>nod, and the two of us head out in<n>search of a
place to chat.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: So... you really think I can win the<n>tryouts?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: If you think I can do it, then let's<n>make it happen.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. If I'm bein' honest with ya, I'm<n>kinda stuck on how
to practice on my<n>own. But I still wanna win, no matter<n>
what...

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: And to do that, I'm bettin' on you.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Besides, I wanna test you—see if<n>there's any grit behind
your words.<n>And at the same time, you can see if I<n>truly
got the makings of a champ!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
We'll just call it... a trial period of<n>sorts! You can train me till
the next<n>tryouts, and then—

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
—we could—hey, lemme finish! Do ya<n>make all your
decisions dis fast?!<n>Whatever happened to hearin' a<n>
person out?!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Simmer down! Ya want the whole<n>school to hear?!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
But well, the spirit's appreciated. On<n>that note, see ya
tomorrow! Can't<n>wait to see whatcha do!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With that, I enthusiastically enter my<n>trial period as Tamamo
Cross's<n>trainer.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The next day, we have our first<n>training session together.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Well, let's see whatcha got for me,<n>rookie. Whaddaya want
me to do<n>first?
choice_data_list: This is the regimen we'll be doing.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I pull out the training plan I wrote out<n>last night. It took me a
while to come<n>up with the perfect plan to win the<n>tryouts.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Whoa... Now this is a lotta exercises.<n>And the detail... You
really made this<n>last night?
choice_data_list: Yup! I was up all night making it!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Dat explains da eye bags! I get that<n>you're excited, but get
some<n>shut-eye...

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Well, at least one thing's<n>clear—you're takin' this as
seriously<n>as I am! Okay, let's get this practice<n>started!
Don't you dare go easy on<n>me!
